goals.active: Help Pact Demolitionist Tonn complete his mission.
goals.complete: I met one of the Pact's premier explosives experts, an asura named Tonn. I helped Tonn take down a set of Orrian siege towers and discovered just how good he is (and how much he enjoys his work). We need a more powerful explosive to destroy the Orrian bone ship, so Tonn and I set out to acquire one.
